text: Linfen Investment Group Co., Ltd. is a Chinese sovereign wealth fund of Linfen Municipal Government, Shanxi Province. The company was the holding company of several utilities of the city. In July 2016, Linfen Investment Group invested in a private equity fund based in Ningbo () for 28.53% stake, which in turn the fund owned 4.0434% stake of Leshi Zhixin, a subsidiary of Le.com.National Enterprise Credit Information Publicity System (in Chinese)] Founder of Le.com, Jia Yueting, was also from Linfen. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Conglomerate companies of China Category:Companies based in Shanxi Category:Companies owned by the provincial government of China
title: Linfen Investment Group
